pageContext.claim: “We're on track for a million illegal aliens to rush our borders. People hate the word "invasion," but that's what it is.”
pageContext.analysis: In the first five months of Fiscal Year 2019, Customs and Border Protection reported 268,044 apprehensions along the southern border. That means on average, they apprehended about 54,000 people putting CBP on track to apprehend about 643,000 people if the trend continues, not one million.
